description:
When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: General Zombie Shunsatsu!! Oars wa Bouken Kibun!!
Mort subite des généraux zombies ! Oz est d`humeur pour l`aventure
The General Zombies Are Down in a Flash!! Oars Feels Like an Adventure!!
Мгновенная смерть генералов-зомби!! Стремление Оза к приключениям
将軍[ジェネラル]ゾンビ瞬殺!! オーズは冒険気分!!
